comment:
Nectar of the gods.

Reminds me of old Caol Ila.

Fruity and dusty.
Vanilla citrus, peach apricot and amazing balance

Nothing to say except the price. But ok

Got this in an auction and this stuff is lovely. A creamy fragrant nose and flavor profile with floral notes, vanilla, citrus, dried fruit, delicate sweet smoke, combined with salty bacon on the palate. No flavor overpowers anywhere here, perfectly balanced.
